data.title: VP Goldensource, Ex. VP Oracle Financial Services
data.meta_description: Glimpses of my life’s journey of extremes. This website is my attempt to share some of the key life experiences, learnings, and readings.
data.text: I have known Paresh for more than 6 years. Though Paresh is considered as a Payments ‘Guru’, I consider him a veteran in BFSI both in terms of Business Domain and in terms of Technology. He is one individual who can communicate effectively with Senior Executives, CIOs in Financial Industry to Program Directors/Managers. His key strengths being – Detail oriented, Analytical and Abstract thinking, Solution Oriented, Strategic thinking. I have constantly looked at Paresh for new Ideas, thoughts at multiple instances. As an individual Paresh has immense energy, a good listener, great team player, dependable and task oriented. All-in-all Paresh is a Professional and it is a privilege to have been associated with him.
